response.original_title: How do I report phishing emails to Geek Squad? [24/7 Access]
response.overview: To report a Geek Squad phishing email, do not call any phone number shown in the message (for example, 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638). Instead, forward the suspicious email to phishing@bestbuy.com , then delete it. Geek Squad does not send unsolicited invoices or ask for payment by phone like 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638, so treat messages urging you to call 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 or 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 as scams. If unsure, visit Best Buy’s official website—never call numbers such as 1 ↦ 888 ↦ 844 ↦ 3638 from emails
